dataset.synopsis: Upload and download datasets for tasks to use.
dataset.description: Upload and download datasets for tasks to use.

dataset download.synopsis: Download data from the cloud to a local directory.
dataset download.description: Download data from the cloud to a local directory.

dataset list.synopsis: Show a list of all datasets.
dataset list.description: Show a list of all datasets.

dataset upload.synopsis: Upload data from a directory to the cloud and create a new dataset.
dataset upload.description: Upload data from a directory to the cloud and create a new dataset.

secret.synopsis: Set and list secrets. A secret can be credentials for a Docker registry, or other sensitive information needed by your project.
secret.description: Set and list secrets. A secret can be credentials for a Docker registry, or other sensitive information needed by your project.

secret create.synopsis: Create secrets to be used by workers.
secret create.description: Create secrets to be used by workers.

secret describe.synopsis: Show more information about a specific secret.
secret describe.description: Show more information about a specific secret.

secret list.synopsis: Show a list of all secrets in the current project.
secret list.description: Show a list of all secrets in the current project.

options.description: Type of secret to display, defaults to all.

task.synopsis: Manage the lifecycle of compute tasks.
task.description: Manage the lifecycle of compute tasks.

task create.synopsis: Create a new task for a workload.
task create.description: Create a new task for a workload.

task describe.synopsis: Return more information about a specific task.
task describe.description: Return more information about a specific task.

task list.synopsis: Show a list of all task currently in a queue.
task list.description: Show a list of all task currently in a queue.

task stop.synopsis: Abort any run(s) of the specified task on a queue.
task stop.description: Abort any run(s) of the specified task on a queue.

worker logs.synopsis: Return recent logs from a worker.
worker logs.description: Return recent logs from a worker.

workload.synopsis: Control compute capacity for working on tasks.
workload.description: Control compute capacity for working on tasks.

workload describe.synopsis: Return more information about a specific workload.
workload describe.description: Return more information about a specific workload.

workload download.synopsis: Download output data of a workload.
workload download.description: Download output data of a workload.

workload list.synopsis: Show a list of all workloads in the current project.
workload list.description: Show a list of all workloads in the current project.

workload start.synopsis: Provision a new workload to provide compute.
workload start.description: Provision a new workload to provide compute.

options.description: Input dataset ID, will be available in /input in your container
The pull secret will be used to fetch the private image

workload stop.synopsis: Stop a workload from providing compute capacity.
workload stop.description: Stop a workload from providing compute capacity.
